description: task-tracker help will list all command options
task-tracker add [task description] will add a task to your list
task-tracker update [task id] [task description] will update a task in your list
task-tracker delete [task id] will delete a task from your task list
task-tracker mark-in-progress [task id] will mark a task as in progress
task-tracker mark-done [task id] will mark a task as done
task-tracker list will list all existing tasks
task-tracker list done will list all done tasks
task-tracker list todo will list all todo tasks
task-tracker list in-progress will list all in-progress tasks
